title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid information.

steps.description: Enter email, password, first/last name, and organization
Confirm success toast and redirect to login

title: User Login with Valid Credentials
description: Ensure user can login with correct email and password via the UI.

title: User Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify login fails gracefully with wrong password.

steps.description: Input valid email and incorrect password
Ensure error banner appears and no redirect occurs

title: Case List and Detail View
description: Validate case listing table, status filter, and drill-down page.

steps.description: Verify table renders seeded cases with pagination
Confirm header shows case metadata, timeline, and tabs

title: Document Upload Flow
description: Ensure drag-and-drop upload UI works and progress indicator updates.

steps.description: Select a small PDF file and fill in document metadata
Verify success alert and redirect back to case detail showing new document entry
